slide.title: Static class members
slide.blurb: Member variables and methods can now be declared static, allowing them to be called from outside an instance of the object
slide.example:
<?php
	class coggeshall {

		static $myvar = 10;
		
		static static_func() { /* ... */ }

		function another_func() { /* ... */ }
	}

	coggeshall::$myvar = 20;
	coggeshall::static_func();
	
?>
